name: Need Love to not be an abandoned!
name_original: Need Love to not be an abandoned!
description:
Just a few years ago, there was a different mysterious events occured in a village, which could not solved by people. Meaningless creatures invaded the village without a meaning. Half of the population was gone, and the other part of population abandoned the village, except a hero, "Ibadullah". After days and months and years and decades and blah blah, Ibadullah found a way to beat those creatures. Solution was love because creatures do not like love - we do not know why they don't - . So, Ibadullah tried to reach every heart he could.

Gameplay time: Infinite

Platforms: Windows/MacOS/Linux

Controls:
Left and Right Arrow Key or "A" and "D" to move.
Space or "W" to jump.

How to play:
You should not touch anything except hearts.
